evidence.description: Approx. 55/45 left-right. Top/bottom appears well-centered but is not fully visible. - Slightly off-center horizontally, with the left border being wider than the right. Vertical centering appears good based on the visible portion of the card.
Moderate whitening and light fraying are visible on both top corners. The bottom corners are not visible for assessment.
Multiple noticeable chips and whitening spots are present along the top edge. Minor nicks are also visible on the side edges. The bottom edge is not visible.
The surface is mostly clean and free of major scratches or scuffs. Image quality limits the detection of very fine imperfections. A small print dot is visible in the text box.

The card exhibits noticeable wear on its corners and edges, particularly the top edge, which is the primary factor limiting its grade. While centering and surface condition are strong, the cumulative border wear brings the card into the Moderately Played (TCGPlayer) or PSA 7 category. The assessment is limited by the partial view of the card.
